footer-desc: Smartphones are mobile phones with a large screen and without a keyboard. This difference is external. Gadgets differ from their older counterparts in a wider range of functions and management principles. In recent years, they have supplanted the use of "push-button" phones and manufacturers are saturating the market with such devices.

home-text: By 2030, a new mobile standard has emerged that offers even higher speeds than 5G. Early sixth-generation (6G) research began in the late 2010s, when China, the United States, and other countries explored the potential for higher-frequency operation. A tenfold increase in data rate means that users use Terabithia per second (Tbit / s). In addition, improved stability and network latency, which is achieved through algorithms.
